where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( minimum_attachment_region_size ) AND EXISTS ( maximum_attachment_region_size ) ) OR ( minimum_attachment_region_size :<>: maximum_attachment_region_size )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( [ stratum_material . electrical_conductivity_classification , stratum_material . magnetic_conductivity_classification , stratum_material . optical_conductivity_classification , stratum_material . thermal_conductivity_classification ] * [ 'conductive' ] ) >= 1

where.label: WR1
where.expression: SIZEOF ( QUERY ( ltjt <* access_mechanisms | NOT ( 'FABRICATION_TECHNOLOGY_ARM.LAND_TEMPLATE_JOIN_TERMINAL' IN TYPEOF ( ltjt ) ) ) ) = 0

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( terminal_connection_zone ) ) OR EXISTS ( connection_zone_category )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( terminal_connection_zone ) ) OR ( SIZEOF ( terminal_connection_zone ) = SIZEOF ( connection_zone_category ) )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: 'FABRICATION_TECHNOLOGY_ARM.LENGTH_DATA_ELEMENT' IN TYPEOF ( SELF \ Requirement_definition_property . required_coordinated_characteristic [ 1 ] . items [ 1 ] )

where.label: WR1
where.expression: NOT ( layer_position = layer_position_type . primary ) OR ( 'FABRICATION_TECHNOLOGY_ARM.DESIGN_LAYER_TECHNOLOGY' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ( layer_position = layer_position_type . secondary ) OR ( 'FABRICATION_TECHNOLOGY_ARM.DESIGN_LAYER_TECHNOLOGY' IN TYPEOF ( SELF ) )

where.label: WR2
where.expression: NOT ( EXISTS ( precedent_stratum_technology_link ) ) OR ( precedent_stratum_technology_link :<>: SELF )

where.label: WR3
where.expression: NOT EXISTS ( precedent_stratum_technology_link ) OR ( precedent_stratum_technology_link . subsequent_stratum_technology :=: precedent_stratum_technology )

function.name: get_electrical_conductivity
function.algorithm: REPEAT i := 1 to SIZEOF ( mi ) by 1 ; IF ( 'CONDUCTIVITY_MATERIAL_ASPECT.' + 'MATERIAL_IDENTIFICATION_WITH_CONDUCTIVITY_CLASSIFICATION' IN TYPEOF ( mi [ i ] ) ) THEN IF ( ( EXISTS ( mi [ i ] . electrical_conductivity_classification ) ) AND ( mi [ i ] . electrical_conductivity_classification IN [ 'conductive' , 'semi conductive' , 'super conductive' ] ) ) THEN RETURN ( TRUE ) ; END_IF ; END_IF ; END_REPEAT ; RETURN ( FALSE ) ;
